content.rendered:
Nahrain is a passionate and driven educator, with 10 years experience in teaching. She is an avid believer that in order to learn, questions must be asked and answers must be provided. Her rich teaching experience in public and private FE & HE institutes in the UK and abroad is complimented by her experience of working in the corporate business world in the early stages of her career. Nahrain has also successfully set up her own businesses in the past; a boutique school that offered short academic courses and an online network marketing business. She has a love for art, travel and discovering new places, as well as writing poetry.

As an  Academic Support Officer, she is committed to ensuring students on the Foundation Business & Management Programme reach a high level of achievement and acquire the necessary knowledge & skills in order to progress in their academic journey. She has a penchant for incorporating technology in the classroom and enjoys interacting with students.

Course taught:

BSc (Hons) Business Management
